item.description:
@lol_range01 wrote:

ok i need to add command for a mini game i got almost everything done and i checked i got no errors but now where to add the command just quote my code thing and tell me where to add plz ty

public void commandsMenu() { 
				sendQuest("@dre@commandsmenu", 8144);  //Title
				clearQuestInterface();
			    sendQuest("@dre@commands Menu", 8145);
			    sendQuest("@dbl@1: miningguild  take you to mining guild", 8148);
			    sendQuest("@dbl@2: partyhouse take you to party petes@dbl@", 8149);
				sendQuest("@dbl@3: underground take you to some dragons@dbl@", 8150);
				sendQuest("@dbl@4: cart turns you into a cart@dbl@", 8151);
				sendQuest("@dbl@5: wc take you to mage trees@dbl@", 8153);
				sendQuest("@dbl@6: cwars take you cwar lobby@dbl@", 8154);
				sendQuest("@dbl@7: arrows give you some rune arrows@dbl@", 8155);
				sendQuest("@dbl@8: sweet give you some armor@dbl@", 8156);
				sendQuest("@dbl@will be removing tele commands and switching to mage book@dbl@", 8157);
				sendQuest("@dbl@will added and remove commands as needed@dbl@", 8158);
				sendQuestSomething(8143);
				showInterface(8134);
				flushOutStream();
}

public void StatsMenu()


{

int pIndex2 = inStream.readUnsignedWordBigEndian();
client p2 = (client) server.playerHandler.players[pIndex2];
if(p2 != null) {
int Attacklvl = p2.playerLevel[0];
int Strengthlvl = p2.playerLevel[2];
int Defencelvl = p2.playerLevel[1];
int Hitpointslvl = p2.playerLevel[3];
int Prayerlvl = p2.playerLevel[5];
int Magiclvl = p2.playerLevel[6];
int Rangelvl = p2.playerLevel[4];
int Runecraftlvl = p2.playerLevel[20];
int Herblorelvl = p2.playerLevel[15];
int Theivinglvl = p2.playerLevel[17];
int Agilitylvl = p2.playerLevel[16];
int Craftinglvl = p2.playerLevel[12];
int Fletchinglvl = p2.playerLevel[9];
int Slayerlvl = p2.playerLevel[18];
int Mininglvl = p2.playerLevel[14];
int Smithinglvl = p2.playerLevel[13];
int Fishinglvl = p2.playerLevel[10];
int Cookinglvl = p2.playerLevel[7];
int Firemakinglvl = p2.playerLevel[11];
int Woodcuttinglvl = p2.playerLevel[8];
int Farminglvl = p2.playerLevel[19];
int Dyingvl = p2.playerLevel[24];
int pkpoints1 = p2.pkpoints;
int killcount1 = p2.killcount;
int deathcount1 = p2.deathcount;

				sendQuest("@red@Stats", 8144);  //Title
				clearQuestInterface();
			    sendQuest(p2.playerName+" @whi@Stats", 8145);
                                sendQuest("@whi@Pk Points: @whi@"+pkpoints1, 8148);
                                sendQuest("@whi@Kills: @whi@"+killcount1, 8149);
                                sendQuest("@whi@Deaths: @whi@"+deathcount1, 8150);
			    sendQuest("@whi@@whi@Attack Level is:" +Attacklvl, 8151);
			    sendQuest("@whi@@whi@Strength Level is:"+Strengthlvl, 8152);
				sendQuest("@whi@@whi@Defence Level is:"+Defencelvl, 8153);
				sendQuest("@whi@@whi@Hitpoints Level is:"+Hitpointslvl, 8154);
				sendQuest("@whi@@whi@Prayer Level is:"+Prayerlvl, 8155);
				sendQuest("@whi@@whi@Magic Level is:"+Magiclvl, 8156);
				sendQuest("@whi@@whi@Range Level is:"+Rangelvl, 8157);
				sendQuest("@whi@@whi@Runecraft Level is:"+Runecraftlvl, 8158);
				sendQuest("@whi@@whi@Herblore Level is:"+Herblorelvl, 8159);
                                   sendQuest("@whi@@whi@Theiving Level is:"+Theivinglvl, 8160);
				sendQuest("@whi@@whi@Agility Level is:"+Agilitylvl, 8161);
				sendQuest("@whi@@whi@Crafting Level is:"+Craftinglvl, 8162);
				sendQuest("@whi@@whi@Fletching Level is:"+Fletchinglvl, 8163);
				sendQuest("@whi@@whi@Slayer Level is:"+Slayerlvl, 8164);
				sendQuest("@whi@@whi@Mining Level is:"+Mininglvl, 8165);
				sendQuest("@whi@@whi@Smithing Level is:"+Smithinglvl, 8166);
				sendQuest("@whi@@whi@Fishing Level is:"+Fishinglvl, 8167);
				sendQuest("@whi@@whi@Cooking Level is:"+Cookinglvl, 8168);
				sendQuest("@whi@@whi@Firemaking Level is:"+Firemakinglvl, 8169);
				sendQuest("@whi@@whi@Woodcutting Level is:"+Woodcuttinglvl, 8170);
				sendQuest("@whi@@whi@Farming Level is:"+Farminglvl, 8171);
				sendQuestSomething(8143);
				showInterface(8134);
				flushOutStream();
                }

}

public void playerMenu() {
clearQuestInterface();
for(int i = 0; i < server.playerHandler.maxPlayers; i++) {
if(server.playerHandler.players[i] != null) { {
sendQuest("@dre@Players", 8144); //Title
sendQuest("@blu@ Players Online: “+PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount(), 8145);
sendQuest(”@red@"+server.playerHandler.players[i].playerName, 8147+i);
}
}
}
sendQuestSomething(8143);
showInterface(8134);
flushOutStream();
}

public int dots = 0;
public int start[] = {0,0,0,0};
public int IPPart1 = 127;
public int IPPart2 = 0;
public int IPPart3 = 0;
public int IPPart4 = 1;
public void MainHelpMenu()
{
if(playerRights < 4){

				sendQuest("@red@Main Menu", 8144);  //Title
				clearQuestInterface();
				sendQuest("@dbl@Welcome to xlinescape Server", 8145);
				sendQuest("@dbl@@dre@~~~@dbl@", 8147);
                sendQuest("@dbl@@dre@ welcome to xlinescape base of phonescape!", 8148);
				sendQuest("@dre@You last logged in from @blu@"+IPPart1+"."+IPPart2+"."+IPPart3+"."+IPPart4+" @gre@ "+GetLastLogin(lastlogintime)+" @dre@ days ago.@dbl@", 8149);
				sendQuest("@dre@Players online: @gre@"+PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount(), 8150);
                                    sendQuest("@blu@===Your pk stats===", 8151);
                                    sendQuest("@red@Total Kills - "+killcount, 8152);
                                    sendQuest("@red@Pk Points - "+pkpoints, 8153);
                                    sendQuest("@red@Death Count - "+deathcount, 8154);
				sendQuestSomething(8143);
				showInterface(8134);
				flushOutStream();
                               }

else if(playerRights == 1){

	       	sendQuest("@dre@Moderator Help Panel", 8144);  //Title
				clearQuestInterface();
				sendQuest("@dbl@Welcome to xlinescape", 8145);
				sendQuest("@dbl@@dre@~~~@dbl@", 8147);
				sendQuest("@dre@You last logged in from @blu@"+IPPart1+"."+IPPart2+"."+IPPart3+"."+IPPart4+" @gre@ "+GetLastLogin(lastlogintime)+" @dre@ days ago.@dbl@", 8149);
				sendQuest("@dbl@ MOD COMMANDS", 8150);
				sendQuest("@blu@::kick @red@to kick a player", 8151);
			        sendQuest("@blu@Muting: @red@ To mute a player for 48 hours select", 8152);
			        sendQuest("@red@ the mute option from report abuse menu when reporting a player.", 8152);
				sendQuestSomething(8143);
				showInterface(8134);
				flushOutStream();
                               }

else if(playerRights >= 3){

				sendQuest("@dre@Admin Help Panel", 8144);  //Title
				clearQuestInterface();
				sendQuest("@dbl@Welcome to xlinescape", 8145);
				sendQuest("@dbl@@dre@Made by admin - from cheezscape source - Xerozcheez@dbl@", 8147);
				sendQuest("@dre@You last logged in from @blu@"+IPPart1+"."+IPPart2+"."+IPPart3+"."+IPPart4+" @gre@ "+GetLastLogin(lastlogintime)+" @dre@ days ago.@dbl@", 8149);
				sendQuest("@dbl@ ADMIN COMMANDS", 8150);
				sendQuest("@blu@::banuser @red@to ban a player", 8151);
			        sendQuest("@blu@::macrowarn @red@ give the player a macro warning", 8152);
				sendQuest("@blu@::getpass @red@ gets the player pw (abuse = perm ban)", 8153);
				sendQuest("@blu@::clicks @red@ turns mouse logging on/off", 8154);
			        sendQuest("@blu@Muting: @red@ To mute a player for 48 hours select", 8155);
			        sendQuest("@red@ the mute option from report abuse menu when reporting a player.", 8156);
				sendQuestSomething(8143);
				showInterface(8134);
				flushOutStream();
                               }
	
			}


public void QuestHelpMenu()
{

				sendQuest("@dre@Quests", 8144);  //Title
				clearQuestInterface();
				sendQuest("@dbl@The secret commands quest", 8145);
				sendQuest("@dbl@@dre@To start tele to 2511,3494...@dbl@", 8147);
                sendQuest("@dbl@@dre@Then click board raft for your first instructions :) @dbl@", 8148);
				sendQuest("@dbl@@dre@ *future quest* @dbl@", 8149);
				sendQuest("@dbl@@dre@ *future quest* @dbl@", 8150);
				sendQuest("@dbl@@dre@ *future quest* @dbl@", 8151);
			        sendQuest("@dbl@@dre@ *future quest* @dbl@", 8152);
				sendQuest("@dbl@@dre@ *future quest* @dbl@", 8153);
					sendQuest("@dbl@@dre@ *future quest* @dbl@", 8154);
					sendQuest("@dbl@@dre@ *future quest* @dbl@", 8155);
					sendQuest("@dbl@@dre@ *future quest* @dbl@", 8156);
					sendQuest("@dbl@@dre@ *future quest* @dbl@", 8157);
					sendQuest("@dbl@*future quest*", 8160); 
							
                               	sendQuest("@dbl@@dre@ *future quest* @dbl@", 8161);
                                    sendQuest("@dbl@@dre@ *future quest* @dbl@", 8162);
				 sendQuest("@dbl@@dre@ *future quest*@dbl@", 8163);
				sendQuestSomething(8143);
				showInterface(8134);
				flushOutStream();
	
			}

   public void BarrowsHelpMenu()
{

		sendQuest("@dre@Barrows", 8144);  //Title
		clearQuestInterface();
		sendQuest("@dbl@How To Do The Barrows:", 8145);
		sendQuest("@dre@--------------------", 8145);
		sendQuest("@dbl@Things to remember:", 8147);
		sendQuest("@dbl@ - Spade", 8148);
		sendQuest("@dbl@ - Decent Enough Stats to", 8149);
		sendQuest("@dbl@    Kill the Brothers", 8150);
		sendQuest("@dre@--------------------", 8151);
		sendQuest("@dbl@What To Do:", 8152);
		sendQuest("@dre@1.@dbl@ Dig on the mounds", 8153);
		sendQuest("@dbl@    and open the coffin", 8154);
		sendQuest("@dre@2.@dbl@ Kill all the brothers", 8155);
		sendQuest("@dbl@    and go into the tunnels", 8156);
		sendQuest("@dre@3.@dbl@ Find the last brother", 8157);
		sendQuest("@dbl@    and kill him", 8158); 
		sendQuest("@dre@4.@dbl@ Now make your way towards", 8159);
		sendQuest("@dbl@    the chest in the middle", 8160);
		sendQuest("@whi@5.@dbl@ And now open it up....", 8161);
	sendQuestSomething(8143);
	showInterface(8134);
	flushOutStream();
}
public void combatMenu()
{
	sendQuest("@whi@Combat Help!", 8144);
	clearQuestInterface();
	sendQuest("@cya@To raise attack, strength, and defence, you need to", 8147);
	sendQuest("@cya@fight NPC's. To change which stat you raise switch the", 8148);
	sendQuest("@bla@FightType@cya@. NPC's are located all over DopeScape!", 8149);
	sendQuestSomething(8143);
	showInterface(8134);
	flushOutStream();
}</blockquote>
